verses.verseString: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verses.verseStringReplacedWithAllah: In the name of Allah, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: I don’t worship what you worship.
Nor are you worshipers of what I worship.
Nor will I worship what you worship.
Nor will you be worshippers of what I worship.
For you is your religion, and for me is mine.”
